meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or admiration.
meanings.sent1: Ooh, that magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: I heard the oohs and aahs from the audience during the fireworks.
meanings.sent3: Ooh, look at that cute puppy!
meanings.sent4: The oohs echoed through the room as the grand reveal took place.
meanings.sent5: The ooh of the crowd filled the air as the singer hit a high note.

meanings.definition: A sound made to show excitement or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The child's ooh of delight was heard across the playground.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but let out an ooh when I saw the delicious cake.
meanings.sent3: The ooh of the crowd signaled the start of the concert.
meanings.sent4: Her ooh was like music to my ears, indicating her joy.
meanings.sent5: The ooh of the audience was a symphony of happiness at the end of the play.
